sen.j: 宇治トンネル（うじトンネル）は、自動車専用道路トンネルである。
sen.e: The Uji Tunnel is a tunnel used exclusively by motor vehicles.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Uji Tunnel is a tunnel used exclusively by motor vehicles.
The Uji Tunnel is a tunnel used exclusively by motor vehicles.

sen.j: これは、京都府宇治市を通る、京滋バイパス上にある。
sen.e: This is located on the Keiji Bypass which runs through Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This is located on the Keiji Bypass which runs through Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture.
This is located on the Keiji Bypass which runs through Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 笠取インターチェンジと宇治東インターチェンジの間にある。
sen.e: It is situated between the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.
It is situated between the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.
It is situated between the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.

sen.j: 総延長が長いため、笠取IC並びに宇治東IC手前500mを除き車線変更禁止となっている。
sen.e: Since the Uji Tunnel extends so long that lane changes are prohibited except for the 500-meter distance ahead of the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.
Since the Uji Tunnel extends so long that lane changes are prohibited except for the 500-meter distance ahead of the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.
Since the Uji Tunnel extends so long that lane changes are prohibited except for the 500-meter distance ahead of the Kasatori Interchange and the Ujihigashi Interchange.
Distance: inbound lane: 4,303 m; outbound lane: 4,313 m
sen.cmt: Inboundに訂正しました、スペース削除しました。

sen.e: Width: two lanes each on the inbound and outbound lanes
Width: Two lanes each on the inbound and outbound lanes
Width: Two lanes each on the inbound and outbound lanes

sen.cmt: スペース削除しました。
